description:
In a world where acquisition costs are skyrocketing, funding is scarce, and ecommerce merchants are forced to do more with less, the most innovative DTC brands understand that subscription strategy is business strategy.

Recharge is simplifying retention and growth for innovative ecommerce brands. As the #1 subscription platform, Recharge is dedicated to empowering brands to easily set up and manage subscriptions, create dynamic experiences at every customer touchpoint, and continuously evaluate business performance. Powering everything from no-code customer portals to personalized offers and customizable bundles, Recharge helps merchants seamlessly manage, grow, and delight their subscribers while reducing operating costs and churn. Today, Recharge powers more than 20,000 merchants serving 100 million subscribers, including brands such as Blueland, Hello Bello, CrunchLabs, Chamberlain Coffee, and Bobbie.

Recharge doesn‚Äôt just help you sell products, we help build buyer routines that last.

Recharge is recognized on the Technology Fast 500, awarded by Deloitte (third consecutive year), and is Great Place to Work Certified.
description_enriched: Recharge is a subscription management platform that powers the growth and retention strategies of more than 20,000 brands.

company_updates.description:
Ideas are completely overrated. They‚Äôre rarely right.

What actually matters is the problem and the number of reps you get talking to customers and building for those problems.  In those reps, ideas evolve fast.  They turn into insights, and those insights turn into the real solutions.

The ‚Äúidea fallacy‚Äù assumes your very first thought is correct and won‚Äôt change.  But that‚Äôs never how anything great gets built.

When I got into commerce, I focused on one core problem: merchants needed better software to start and scale their businesses.  This was before anyone had built in the Shopify ecosystem. So I focused there and within a year, I launched seven different Shopify apps tackling different angles of that problem.

Eventually, I landed on subscriptions. And honestly, I thought it was a terrible idea at the time. ‚ÄúSubscribe & save‚Äù had just launched, and the idea that people would pay shipping for small consumables instead of going to the store sounded crazy.

But I wasn‚Äôt married to the idea, I was committed to solving the problem.  So I built it out in a month just to see if it worked.

That mindset, not being attached to any one idea, gave me the freedom to keep iterating until I found the thing that hit.

Estrid is one of Europe‚Äôs most iconic subscription brands, but legacy tech was holding them back. Scaling features was slow, agility limited, and their stack couldn‚Äôt keep pace with growth.

To future-proof, Estrid partnered with Woolman to replatform onto Shopify + Recharge, migrating millions of subscriptions with zero disruption. The new stack gave them the freedom to build faster, test smarter, and scale globally.

Now their teams move with speed and confidence. A sleek self-serve portal empowers customers, CX overhead is down, and retention flows are at the core of their growth strategy.

With Shopify + Recharge, Estrid has shed the weight of legacy systems and unlocked speed to scale.

üöÄ One week to go!

We‚Äôre officially counting down to ChargeX London - a full-day experience bringing together leaders, visionaries, and innovators shaping the future of the subscription industry.

We‚Äôve got an all-star lineup including:
 ‚ú® Roshni Patel  from Wild Nutrition
 ‚ú® Maxine Laceby from Absolute Collagen
 ‚ú® Eli Wachsmann from Fuzzball, our Tomorrow Brand Challenge winner
 ‚ú® Industry experts Tash Courtenay-Smith and Thomas Lalas

Expect thought-provoking sessions, incredible networking, and a peek into what‚Äôs next for subscriptions.

We‚Äôre officially waitlist only, but‚Ä¶ there‚Äôs still a way to join the fun üëâ ChargeX After Dark - our evening party where conversations flow, connections form, and this definitely isn‚Äôt your typical networking mixer.

Link in bio! Can't wait to see you London üá¨üáß

Subscription models are entering their next phase ‚Äî one that‚Äôs personal, flexible and built around the individual.

At eCommerce Expo, we asked Mathew Mosveen from Recharge how he sees subscriptions evolving in 2026.

His answer? It‚Äôs all about lowering barriers to unlock true personalisation.

BFCM traffic is rolling in, but are you letting shoppers walk away with half-full carts?

Cross-sells. Bundles. Smart incentives. The secret to real holiday profit isn‚Äôt more traffic, it‚Äôs higher AOV.

Join us tomorrow, Oct 8 with Arrae, Carpe and Oats Overnight to learn how subscription brands turn checkout moments into revenue momentum. 

Link in the comments to register!

üèîÔ∏è A week in Park City we won‚Äôt forget.

Last week, nearly 400 Recharge team members came together in Park City, Utah for our company-wide offsite - a week filled with learning, connection, innovation, and plenty of fun.

We heard from Oisin O'Connor and Michael Flynn on the vision for what‚Äôs next, learned from two of our incredible merchants about their growth and collaboration with Recharge, and got a first look at product updates that will shape the next era of commerce.

Our teams also rolled up their sleeves for a half-day of AI-focused workshops - exploring new ideas, experimenting with tools, and sparking innovation across departments.

And while we can‚Äôt share everything just yet, we‚Äôre especially excited about our upcoming AI-powered agents, designed to give brands the insights and actions they need without the friction.

Because being the best hands-on partner in the ecommerce ecosystem starts from within - through collaboration, innovation, and a shared commitment to helping brands retain and delight their shoppers.

And of course, we made time for fun. Because when we build together, we build stronger. üí•

September was one busy and impactful month üöÄ

From connecting directly with our merchants, to building community, and enabling brands that are shaping the future of commerce - the month was full of energy, ideas, and meaningful conversations.

At Recharge, being a true partner means more than powering subscriptions. It‚Äôs about showing up in the room, fostering real connection, and helping our merchants grow and scale in lasting ways.

We wrapped September with our company offsite - a chance to come together as a team, reflect, and align on new ways we can better serve our merchants. üí°

Here‚Äôs a look back at everywhere we showed up in September üëâ

We‚Äôre thrilled to highlight how Forthglade Natural Pet Food | B Corp Certified has been able to supercharge their subscription business by integrating Klaviyo + Relo + Recharge.

üîç What changed:
 ‚Ä¢ A 26% boost in product subscriptions through targeted flows & behavioral triggers
 ‚Ä¢ 16.7% conversion from welcome emails sent to prospects
 ‚Ä¢ 5.5% lift in form submit rates

How they did it: identifying one-time buyers showing repeat purchase signals, then reaching them with the right content & incentives at the right moment. The ‚ÄúMagic Cart‚Äù experience made subscribing feel almost effortless.

At Recharge, we believe subscription growth is not just about getting customers to ‚Äúsubscribe‚Äù - it‚Äôs about meeting them where they are, reducing friction, and being part of their journey.

https://lnkd.in/eTG8iM5J

In 2015, quip. built a custom subscription platform that powered their rise in oral care. But as they scaled, maintaining in-house tech drained resources and SaaS leaders like Shopify and Recharge surged ahead with faster, more cost-effective features.

So quip made the switch. 

In just 90 days, millions of subscriptions migrated seamlessly to Recharge, unlocking flexible management, faster rollouts, and predictable costs.

Now powered by Shopify + Recharge, quip runs better than ever - freeing their team to focus on what matters most: creating joyful customer experiences and driving better oral health outcomes.

Don't get caught chasing shiny new customers this BFCM while leaving your subscribers out in the cold.

Show them love. Give them perks. Remind them why they love your brand in the first place.

Want more ideas? Join us Oct 8 with Arrae, Oats Overnight and Carpe as we break down how subscription brands can turn holiday spikes into long-term success.

https://hubs.ly/Q03JRVdS0

At Recharge, we run our engagement survey every year for a reason - to listen.

This year, one theme stood out loud and clear: our people want more opportunities to learn and grow.

 And honestly, that says everything about the incredible team we have here - curious, driven, and always evolving.

So, we turned that feedback into action.
Last week, we hosted our first-ever Learning Week - a five-day, company-wide initiative featuring 20 sessions led by Rechargers from across the org.

From prompt engineering to negotiation, sourdough baking, and slide design, there was truly something for everyone. 

Our goals were simple:
 ‚ú® Encourage cross-functional connection
 ‚ú® Highlight internal talent
 ‚ú® Make space for growth
 ‚ú® Spark curiosity

The result?

 Over 1,000 attendees joined across 615+ minutes of learning - all led by our own team members.

A huge thank you to Gia Giambrone, Kelli Sweeney, and every Recharger who stepped up to share their knowledge! 

You made this week something truly special - and a reminder that at Recharge, learning never stops. üíô

üîî Clear communication is key in subscription offers, especially during BFCM!

Daniel Nunn, Head of Ecommerce at Carpe, emphasizes the importance of transparency in subscription offers. He advises making the terms crystal clear upfront to avoid surprises and dissatisfaction post-holidays.

Interestingly, BFCM customers often require more attention. Daniel suggests segmenting these value-oriented customers and offering tailored discounts to keep them engaged long-term.

Remember, meeting your customers halfway can turn deal-seekers into loyal subscribers

From day one, Oats Overnight built their business on Shopify + Recharge - and today, 90% of their DTC sales come from subscribers.

That kind of loyalty doesn‚Äôt happen by chance. The Oats Overnight team is relentless about finding and fixing pain points, big and small.

In 2023, they overhauled their customer portal into a fully branded, personalized hub where subscribers can manage orders and unlock exclusive perks. And by layering in tools like passwordless login to remove friction and Failed Payment Recovery to reduce passive churn, they‚Äôve smoothed away barriers to customer happiness while saving their team time.

With Shopify + Recharge as partners, Oats Overnight has the flexibility to act fast, customize with ease, and keep elevating the subscriber experience at every level.

We‚Äôre still buzzing from ChargeX London üá¨üáß

Our annual conference made its way to the UK for the first time - bringing together our incredible merchants, partners, and ecosystem leaders for a day of connection, collaboration, and forward-thinking conversations.

From hearing our leadership share what‚Äôs next for Recharge, to learning from merchants like Absolute Collagen and Wild Nutrition, to diving deep with industry experts like Thomas Lalas - the energy in the room reminded us of one thing: collaboration starts together.

We‚Äôre proud to work alongside the brands and partners shaping the future of subscriptions across EMEA!

üîî Attention subscription brands! Are your loyal customers feeling left out during big sales?

Kendall Singer Cook from Arrae shares a genius solution ‚Üí Offer existing subscribers bonus credits for purchases during Black Friday/Cyber Monday.

Here‚Äôs why it works:
 ‚úÖ Rewards long-term customers
 ‚úÖ Prevents churn from ‚Äúoffer gamification‚Äù
 ‚úÖ Keeps spending inside your ecosystem

By leveraging Recharge‚Äôs credit system, Arrae found a cost-effective way to drive sales and strengthen retention - a win-win for both customers and the brand.

The smartest brands focus on locking in longer-term subscribers rather than relying on deep, one-time discounts.

When you reward loyalty and emphasize subscription value year-round, sustainable growth follows.

üí° What are you doing this season to keep your subscribers feeling valued?

In today‚Äôs high-CAC world, innovative brands are looking beyond discounts to drive subscriber growth. 

That‚Äôs why LOLA - mylola.com turned to Recharge + Beam Impact: to make subscribing feel like more than a transaction. Every order lets customers direct 1% toward causes aligned with LOLA‚Äôs mission - like funding period products for underserved teens - at no extra cost!

The results speak volumes:
‚ú® 11% boost in subscription sign-ups
‚ú® 13.8% lift in conversion
‚ú® 5.1x ROI on donation and platform fees

And it doesn‚Äôt stop at sign-up. Through Recharge‚Äôs customer portal, subscribers can track the ongoing impact of every renewal, turning loyalty into a movement.

Together, Beam + Recharge helped LOLA prove that mission-led growth isn‚Äôt just good for communities - it‚Äôs a powerful driver of customer acquisition and retention.

our brands‚Äô long-term success. Over the last year, we launched TMRW Brand, the largest challenge in eCommerce history. Hundreds of brands leaned in, motivated to grow and retain their subscribers, and the winners earned more than just results - they earned a moment of celebration.

That moment came together in Italy, where we brought our TMRW Brand winners together to recognize their wins, share their stories, and celebrate the future they‚Äôre building.

To our winners: congratulations.¬†Eli Wachsmann, Jacob Biren, Derek Rucki, Jon Karwacki, Gina Stevenson & Todd Stevenson
Your innovation, drive, and commitment to your customers set the standard for what‚Äôs possible in eCommerce.

And to the entire Recharge community: this is just the beginning. We‚Äôre excited to continue building the future of subscriptions - together.

As Cardio Miracle scaled, subscriptions became essential to help their routine-driven audience stay consistent. But scattered tools and unclear upgrade paths made it harder for customers to commit leading to missed opportunities for long-term growth.

Solution: one unified upsell experience.

With Recharge‚Äôs upsell tools, Cardio Miracle added one-click subscription upgrades across the product page, cart, and checkout within minutes, and at no extra cost.

They saw a 23.63% increase in subscription sales, with the cart alone driving 13.68% of the lift. On the backend, fewer third-party apps meant less maintenance and more time to focus on growth.

Read the full story here: https://lnkd.in/ea8p9Umb

The results speak for themselves:

‚ú® 2x conversion rates with a custom Shopify theme

‚ú® 80% more efficient B2B operations

We‚Äôre thrilled to be part of Pura‚Äôs explosive growth and look forward to seeing how they continue to push the boundaries of the fragrance industry.

The hard truth: recurring revenue has never been more critical for merchants, but most subscription models are broken.

They frustrate customers, leak revenue, and struggle with churn.

That's why our strengthened partnership with Recharge matters more than ever. We've spent years building the subscription tools that businesses actually need (and have $30B in processed GMV to prove it.) Together, these tools turn subscribers into long-term revenue‚Äîwithout the frustration.

And what happens when subscription technology actually works?
‚ñ™Ô∏è Increase in recurring orders by 82% (Oats Overnight proved it) 
‚ñ™Ô∏è Recover failed payments up to 44% (Apoth√©kary‚Äôs success story)
‚ñ™Ô∏è Grow new subscriber base by 8X (Just ask CrunchLabs) 

We know what‚Äôs possible when the right infrastructure meets the right moment. Now we‚Äôre bringing that momentum to more merchants - together.

Consumer behavior is evolving faster than I‚Äôve ever seen, and brands need to keep up

1. Consumers are discovering products on TikTok and Instagram

2. They‚Äôre asking ChatGPT for product comparisons

3. They‚Äôre repurchasing only the items that pass the test

This isn‚Äôt just a channel shift, but a customer mindset shift. 

Brands need to deliver simple, intuitive experiences where and when customers need them most. 

So we thought, what if managing a subscription could be as easy as texting a friend? 

And what if the tool on the other end actually knew your customer, like their preferences, history, and intent?

That‚Äôs why we built Concierge SMS. 

Not as another feature, but as a reimagination of the customer experience itself: proactive, conversational, and built on AI. 

With Concierge SMS, brands are delivering:

‚òëÔ∏è AI-powered messages at key moments

This isn‚Äôt just a new interface‚Äîit‚Äôs the new customer expectation
